page.description: Replace the style used by one or more selected components. If a list of components is supplied, 'runsilent' can be set to True. The component selection dialog will not appear if 'runsilent' is True. If a style is not specified, the current default style is used. A dialog will always show the progress of the operation.
page.syntax: P a5wcb_Replace_Comp_Style([C style_name [,C project [,C component_list [,C title [,L runsilent]]]]])
